name: Fast Police Reckless Speed Driving Furious Car Auto Racing Legends HD Free
name_original: Fast Police Reckless Speed Driving Furious Car Auto Racing Legends HD Free
description:
Do you think you're the best racer out there? It's time to prove it in this fast action paced game. Outrun the swarming cops with these exotic tuners to claim your prize.

Amazing real life graphics with arcade style gameplay.

Challenge a friend to use Game Center to beat your friends high scores!
